drug.name: Racivir
drug.description: Racivir, also known as RCV, is an oxothiolane nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor similar to emtricitabine and lamivudine. Racivir is a 50:50 mixture of emtricitabine [DB00879] and its positive enantiomer. Racivir has been used in trials studying the prevention of HIV Infections.

drug-interaction.name: Rubella virus vaccine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Rubella virus vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Racivir.
